tool_description: Identify and extract speech segments from an audio or video file, regardless of the language being spoken.
name: Speech Detection
title: Speech Detection

api_list.name: Get speech segments from audio
api_list.description: Upload an audio or video file and get back a list of time segments where speech was detected.

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: Audio or video file of maximum 10 MB.
